title: New: Drake – Dreams Money Can Buy
body:
With **Drake’s** sophomore LP just around the corner, it’s nice to see his new material sounding as fresh as this.

  _Dreams Money Can Buy_ was dropped on Drake’s blog a few days ago accompanied with this statement “_Not my single. Just a piece of my story. Hear me out though…_”; certainly interesting when pondering the style of the new album. The track itself samples **Jai Paul’s** underground anthem _BTSTU_, lifting the day-dream sounding lyrics and wrapping it in the honest and believable world that **Drake** creates so confidently. Check it out bellow.
